caption.p: Nearest neighbor relationships for single- and multi-target compounds from mixed assays. KDE plots report the distribution of closest similarity relationships according to Figure 2. In ( a), the similarity value distributions are reported for the original data set. In ( b, c), NN calculations were carried out after random removal of 50% of the MT- and ST-CPDs and removal of 50% of the NNs from MT- and ST-CPDs, respectively.
